title: Was I supposed to get Ashe for free?
body:
I'm a new LoL player leveling up a new account. There are multiple sources -- the wiki for one -- which explicitly say that Ashe is given for free. But, as of level 12, I haven't received her. I think I was supposed to get her at level 2. Is the information I'm seeing out of date? If not, is there some recourse for me to get her?

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey TickleM0nst3r,

You should have received the free Ashe Champion Permanent with the opening of your Level 2 Level Up Capsule. Please check your Hextech Loot for the Capsules and open them, and you should receive the Permanent which you should be able to add to your Inventory.

If you have any other questions, feel free to reply here! ^-^

Hi, HeyItzSteve,

Thanks for the reply. I've definitely opened all my capsules. The permanent shards I have are Ahri, Brand, Garen and Caitlyn. Perhaps I got Ahri instead of Ashe? I guess that's a better deal but it seems odd that the rewards would vary.

That is definitely odd. Are you sure that you did not accidentally disenchant the shard? 

Just for some additional information, when did you create your account?

I'm sure I didn't disenchant it. Although I'm new to LoL it's not my first f2p game so I'm pretty careful about resources before I understand what I have.

My account was created on 12/27/2018.

> [{quoted}](name=TickleM0nst3r,realm=NA,application-id=okOuNvuT,discussion-id=73YQ07Lc,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T23:23:11.580+0000)
>
> I'm sure I didn't disenchant it. Although I'm new to LoL it's not my first f2p game so I'm pretty careful about resources before I understand what I have.
> 
> My account was created on 12/27/2018.

Steve is correct, here's the support page that details what you will receive from Summoner Level 2 - 10 (and beyond):
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824

* Level 2 - 	Pick one: Lux, Master Yi, Miss Fortune, Ahri, Darius
* Level 3 - 	Caitlyn (full champion)	
* Level 4 - 	Garen (full champion)
* Level 5 - 	Brand (full champion) 
* Level 6 - 	Xin Zhao shard
* Level 7 - 	810 BE	 
* Level 8 - 	Janna shard
* Level 9 - 	810 BE
* Level 10 - 	50/50: Sherwood Ashe _**or**_ Sanguine Garen + 500 OE + 1 random ward skin + random 450 shard
Just an update: Looks like that Wiki page is outdated. Recently created a new account and I can confirm that Ashe was not part of the rewards for leveling up to Level 2.
